content: 4 chain 12 double_crochet 3 times you have 4 groups of 12 double_crochet row 43 turn decrease 2 groups make 12 double_crochet 2 chain single_crochet in the 4ch-space 2 chain 12 double_crochet you have 2 groups of 12 double_crochet row 44 turn make 3 chain 11 double_crochet 4 chain 12 double_crochet you have 2 groups of 12 double_crochet row 45 turn make an single_crochet in every double_crochet and 4 single_crochet in the 4ch-space if you want to you can make 3 single_crochet in every double_crochet and in every 3ch-space pretending to be a double_crochet along the straight edge leading from the last row to round 14 it will make the edge look a lot smoother either way bind off and weave in all ends magic carpet studio www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com if you make the seashell carpet please send me a photo of it with some details about yourself like your name and where you re from i m curious to know how far my design travels www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com check out my other carpets http //magiccarpetstudio blogspot com/p/portfolio html magic carpet studio www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com
